[[Alpharetta, Georgia]] | capacity = ???? | chrtitle = Owner | chairman = {{flagicon|USA}} [[Massoud Roushandel]] | mgrtitle = Head Coach | manager = {{flagicon|USA}} [[Massoud Roushandel]] | league = [[USL Premier Development League]] | season = [[2010 PDL Season|2010]] | position = 3rd, Southeast
Playoffs: DNQ | American = true | pattern_la1 = _white_stripes2 | pattern_b1 = _whitestripeonright | pattern_ra1 = _white_stripes2 | leftarm1 = 000000 | body1 = 000000 | rightarm1 = 000000 | shorts1 = 000000 | socks1 = 000000 | pattern_la2 = | pattern_b2 = | pattern_ra2 = | leftarm2 = FFFFFF | body2 = FFFFFF | rightarm2 = FFFFFF | shorts2 = 000000 | socks2 = FFFFFF | }} '''Atlanta Blackhawks''' was an American [[association football|soccer]] team based in [[Atlanta, Georgia]], [[United States]]. Founded in 2009, the team played in the [[USL Premier Development League]] (PDL), the fourth tier of the [[American Soccer Pyramid]], in the Southeast Division of the Southern Conference. The franchise folded at the end of the 2010 season and left the league thereafter. The team played its home games in the stadium at [[Alpharetta High School]] in nearby [[Alpharetta, Georgia]]. The team's colors were black and white. ==History== The Blackhawks joined the PDL in 2009http://www.uslsoccer.com/home/302736.html, and played their first ever game on May 9, 2009, away at [[Mississippi Brilla]]. The Blackhawks lost game 2-1, with the first goal in franchise history being scored by [[Babayele Sodade]]http://www.uslsoccer.com/stats/2009/1026857.html. ==Players== ===Final roster=== This list is a historical record of the final group of players on the last Blackhawks roster for their final game in August 2010.
